featured.text: Type ABs are artistic but mysterious and unpredictable, and type Bs are cheerful but eccentric, individualistic, and selfish.

definition.zh_def: 自私的；只考慮自己利益的
definition.en_def: Concerned primarily with one's own interests, benefits, or welfare, often at the expense of others.
definition.example: He was too selfish to share his toys with his friends.
